allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add MiniMax M2 as key model to evaluate

- Highlight M2 as potential dark horse \(not overfit to benchmarks\)
- Add M2 to all baseline and 3-agent experiment plans
- Include M2+Sonnet+M2 hybrid configuration
- Update budget estimates \(~$37 total for experiments\)
- Note M2''s strong tool use and fast inference characteristics

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(docker compose run --rm nl2sql bash -c "echo ''User:'' && whoami && echo && claude --dangerously-skip-permissions -p ''echo hello'' 2>&1 | head -20")
Bash(docker compose run --rm nl2sql bash -c "whoami && ls -la /home/dev/ && echo && claude --dangerously-skip-permissions -p ''say hello'' 2>&1 | head -30")
